title: Michael K. Williams on the Debate, Police Reform, Lovecraft Country and More
description:
Renowned actor Michael K. Williams joins the show to discuss his activism, the presidential debate, his acting process and more. Katie and Matt discuss a few moments from the debate and a frustrating Fox News story.

Merch Link: https://teespring.com/stores/useful-idiots
